convlab.spec package¶

Submodules¶

convlab.spec.spec_util module¶

convlab.spec.spec_util.SPEC_DIR = 'convlab/spec'¶

All spec values are already param, inferred automatically. To change from a value into param range, e.g. - single: “explore_anneal_epi”: 50 - continuous param: “explore_anneal_epi”: {“min”: 50, “max”: 100, “dist”: “uniform”} - discrete range: “explore_anneal_epi”: {“values”: [50, 75, 100]}

convlab.spec.spec_util.check(spec)[source]¶

Check a single spec for validity

convlab.spec.spec_util.check_all()[source]¶

Check all spec files, all specs.

convlab.spec.spec_util.check_body_spec(spec)[source]¶

Base method to check body spec for multi-agent multi-env

convlab.spec.spec_util.check_comp_spec(comp_spec, comp_spec_format)[source]¶

Base method to check component spec

convlab.spec.spec_util.check_compatibility(spec)[source]¶

Check compatibility among spec setups

convlab.spec.spec_util.extend_meta_spec(spec)[source]¶

Extend meta spec with information for lab functions

convlab.spec.spec_util.get(spec_file, spec_name)[source]¶

Get an experiment spec from spec_file, spec_name. Auto-check spec. @example

spec = spec_util.get(‘base.json’, ‘base_case_openai’)

convlab.spec.spec_util.get_eval_spec(spec_file, spec_name, prename=None)[source]¶

Get spec for eval mode

convlab.spec.spec_util.get_param_specs(spec)[source]¶

Return a list of specs with substituted spec_params

convlab.spec.spec_util.override_dev_spec(spec)[source]¶
convlab.spec.spec_util.override_eval_spec(spec)[source]¶
convlab.spec.spec_util.override_test_spec(spec)[source]¶
convlab.spec.spec_util.save(spec, unit='experiment')[source]¶

Save spec to proper path. Called at Experiment or Trial init.

convlab.spec.spec_util.tick(spec, unit)[source]¶

Method to tick lab unit (experiment, trial, session) in meta spec to advance their indices Reset lower lab indices to -1 so that they tick to 0 spec_util.tick(spec, ‘session’) session = Session(spec)

Module contents¶

The spec module Handles the Lab experiment spec: reading, writing(evolution), validation and default setting Expands the spec and params into consumable inputs in info space for lab units.
